## Part 1

### Load Data
```{r load_data}
library(datasets)
data(WorldPhones)
WorldPhones
```

### Clean Data
```{r clean_data}
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)

WorldPhones %>%
  tbl_df() %>%
  mutate(year = factor(row.names(WorldPhones))) %>%
  gather(country, number, -year) %>%
  mutate(country = factor(country))
```
